title: Large brick double on Clifton Blvd.
posting_body: First floor Suite.
Approximately 1,700+ Sq.
Ft. of living space!
Beautiful House in heart of Lakewood on a nicest street across Lakewood Park.
You get both a private front and rear Entrance to use.
There are two generous size bedrooms, Master bedroom with a walk-in closet, a Library/Study room,  Living room connects to Dining room via double French beveled glass door w/a Fireplace.
A private enclosed front porch and a back porch.
A foyer with a guest closet, one private generous size full Bath with a half bath in the Basement, full size modern Kitchen and a private Laundry station in the finished basement.
You get beautiful Oak hardwood floors throughout, 9' feet tall ceilings with very unique original ceiling architectural designs and crown moldings.
Includes 1-private assigned parking in a private fenced-in yard with gate.
Beveled glass windows and doors throughout.
All electrical LED lighting and water softener system provided and maintained free by owner.
Appliances provided: Stove, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, A/C, Washer, Dryer, (3) "Hunter" ceiling Fans.
Rent: $1200 monthly + all Utilities.
Security deposit: $1200.
Owned & managed by CSU alumni.
**Secured property** MUST HAVE GOOD CREDIT & CLEAN BACKGROUND CHECK.
Located within 1-mile of Upscale Dining, all Shopping conveniences, next to Bus line, near I-90 exit and across Lakewood Park.
Please call:
show contact info
to schedule a private viewing of this exceptional home.
All showings set by phone-appointment only.
Equal Housing Opportunity.
Absolutely  ***NO PETS - NO SMOKERS PLEASE***
If you are a SMOKER Inside or Outside, do not contact me.
(Leave full name, phone # and email for a reply & screening required).
Application fee $40.
